generation

Class BSPLeaf

  • java.lang.Object
    • generation.BSPNode
      • generation.BSPLeaf

  • public class BSPLeaf
extends BSPNode
    A leaf node for a tree of BSPNodes. It carries a list of segments. This code is refactored code from Maze.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes. Refactored by Peter Kemper

      • store

        public int store(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
        org.w3c.dom.Element mazeXML,
        int number)
        Store the content of a leaf node, in particular its list of segments. All entries carry the number of the node as an index and each segment has an additional second index for the segment number.
        Overrides:
        store in class BSPNode
        Parameters:
        doc - document to add data to
        mazeXML - element to add data to
        number - is an index number for this node in the XML format
        Returns:
        the highest used index number, in this case the given number
